title: Element Outdoor Clothing: Complete Guide to Quality Hunting Apparel That Won't Break the Bank
description: Yes, Element Outdoor Clothing offers exceptional value for money. While priced significantly lower than premium brands like Sitka or Kuiu, it delivers comparable performance in key areas like water resistance, scent control, and durability. The brand focuses on providing working hunters with quality gear at accessible prices, making it an excellent choice for budget-conscious outdoors enthusiasts who don't want to compromise on essential features. My extensive field testing confirms that Element performs admirably across various hunting conditions while costing 40-60% less than premium alternatives.

body:
Element Outdoor Clothing: Complete Guide to Quality Hunting Apparel That Won't Break the Bank

As someone who has spent countless hours testing hunting gear across various terrains and conditions, I understand the challenge of finding quality outdoor apparel that doesn't drain your bank account. Element outdoor clothing has emerged as a game-changer in the hunting apparel market, offering premium features at accessible prices. Whether you're planning your next national park adventure or gearing up for hunting season, this comprehensive guide will help you make informed decisions about Element's product line. For more outdoor gear recommendations, visit our homepage at Explore National Parks Store.

Table of Contents

  • What Makes Element Outdoor Clothing Stand Out
  • Complete Product Line Analysis
  • Performance Testing and Real-World Experience
  • Comparing Element to Premium Brands
  • User Reviews and Community Feedback
  • Buying Guide and Best Products
  • Conclusion

What Makes Element Outdoor Clothing Stand Out

Element outdoor clothing has carved out a unique position in the competitive hunting apparel market by focusing on one core principle: delivering premium performance without the premium price tag. Founded by working hunters who understood the frustration of choosing between quality and affordability, Element Outdoors has built their reputation on technical innovation and real-world testing. The brand's commitment to affordability doesn't mean compromising on essential features. Element outdoor clothing incorporates advanced technologies like Polygiene odor control, which uses silver ions to neutralize odor-causing bacteria, and their proprietary EO Grid fabric technology that provides superior moisture management. These features, typically found in clothing costing twice as much, demonstrate Element's dedication to democratizing high-performance hunting gear. What truly sets Element outdoor clothing apart is their direct-to-consumer business model, which eliminates middleman markups that often inflate prices in the outdoor industry. This approach allows them to invest more in research and development while keeping retail prices accessible to average hunters. The company maintains strong relationships with archery shops and specialized outdoor retailers, ensuring product availability without the overhead costs of big-box retail partnerships. Element's partnership with professional archer Levi Morgan further validates their commitment to performance. Morgan, known for his precision and attention to detail, wouldn't associate with a brand that couldn't deliver on its promises. This endorsement carries significant weight in the hunting community, where reputation and proven performance matter more than marketing budgets. The brand's "Geared for More" philosophy extends beyond hunting into everyday outdoor activities. Whether you're exploring outdoor adventure clothing for hiking or need waterproof outdoor clothing for harsh weather, Element's versatile designs transition seamlessly from hunting blinds to hiking trails. This versatility makes Element outdoor clothing an excellent investment for multi-sport outdoor enthusiasts who want one kit that performs across various activities.

Complete Product Line Analysis

Drive Series: Lightweight Performance

The Drive Series represents Element outdoor clothing's entry-level offering, but "entry-level" doesn't mean basic performance. These lightweight garments feature moisture-wicking polyester construction with DWR (Durable Water Repellent) coating and integrated scent control technology. The Drive Series quarter-zip shirts and lightweight pants are perfect for early season hunting when temperatures are moderate and mobility is crucial. During my testing, the Drive Series pants impressed with their quiet fabric and comfortable fit. The lightweight construction makes them ideal for active hunting styles, while the water-resistant treatment provides adequate protection against morning dew and light precipitation. For hunters seeking affordable alternatives to premium brands, the Drive Series offers exceptional value.

Prime Series: Mid-Weight Versatility

The Prime Series strikes the perfect balance between warmth and breathability, making it Element outdoor clothing's most versatile line. The Prime Series jacket features bonded fabric construction with EO Grid lining for superior moisture management and insulation. Multiple pocket configurations, including chest pockets and hand warmers, provide practical storage without bulk. What sets the Prime Series apart is its three-layer construction that provides windproof and water-resistant protection while maintaining breathability. The jacket's waist cinch and wrist cinches help seal out wind and retain body heat without restricting movement. YKK zippers throughout ensure reliability in harsh conditions, while the quiet shell fabric won't spook game during critical moments.

Infinity Series: Heavy-Duty Protection

For extreme weather conditions, Element outdoor clothing's Infinity Series delivers maximum protection. The heavy waterproof bibs and jackets in this line feature fully seam-sealed construction with reinforced knees and seat areas. The Infinity Series is designed for hunters who face the harshest conditions, from late-season whitetail hunting to waterfowl hunting in driving rain. The Infinity Series bibs include adjustable suspenders, zippered leg openings for easy on/off over boots, and reinforced scuff guards. The jacket features a full-zip design with storm flap, adjustable hood, and extended tail for complete coverage. While heavier than other series, the Infinity line provides uncompromising protection when weather conditions deteriorate.

Flexlite Series: Insect Shield Technology

Element outdoor clothing's newest innovation, the Flexlite Series, incorporates Insect Shield technology that converts clothing into effective insect repellent. This EPA-registered treatment repels mosquitoes, ticks, flies, chiggers, and other biting insects without chemicals on your skin. For hunters pursuing spring turkey or fishing in bug-heavy environments, the Flexlite Series offers game-changing protection. The Flexlite garments maintain the lightweight, breathable characteristics hunters need for warm-weather activities while providing built-in insect protection that lasts through 70+ washes. This technology eliminates the need for topical repellents, reducing scent contamination concerns while providing more consistent protection throughout long days outdoors.

Performance Testing and Real-World Experience

My Three-Season Element Outdoor Clothing Test

Over the past two hunting seasons, I've extensively field-tested Element outdoor clothing across various conditions and environments. My test kit included the Drive Series lightweight pants, Prime Series jacket, and Infinity Series bibs, providing comprehensive coverage for different weather scenarios and hunting styles. Early season testing in September temperatures ranging from 40-70¬∞F revealed the Drive Series' strengths and limitations. The lightweight pants performed exceptionally during active hunting, staying comfortable during long hikes and providing adequate warmth during morning sits. However, in temperatures below 45¬∞F, I needed additional base layers for extended stationary periods. The fabric's quiet performance exceeded expectations, producing minimal noise during movement through thick brush. Mid-season testing of the Prime Series jacket during October's variable weather conditions showcased Element outdoor clothing's versatility. During a particularly challenging week with temperatures ranging from 25¬∞F to 60¬∞F and conditions including rain, snow, and wind, the Prime Series jacket handled everything exceptionally well. The bonded fabric construction proved windproof, while the EO Grid lining effectively managed moisture during active periods.

Cold Weather Performance Analysis

Late-season testing pushed Element outdoor clothing to its limits during December hunts with temperatures as low as 10¬∞F and wind chills below zero. The Infinity Series bibs provided excellent protection, with fully sealed seams preventing moisture infiltration during freezing rain. The reinforced seat and knee areas proved valuable during extended ground sits, maintaining waterproof integrity where other brands often fail. One memorable morning hunting public land in Wisconsin, I spent four hours in a ground blind during steady freezing rain. While hunting companions in premium brands complained about moisture intrusion, my Element outdoor clothing kept me completely dry. The storm flap on the Infinity jacket and the high-back design of the bibs created an effective barrier against driving precipitation. Temperature regulation proved impressive across all series. The layering system worked effectively, with base layers, mid-layers, and Element outer shells providing adequate warmth without overheating during active periods. The jacket's pit zips and the bibs' side zippers allowed quick venting when temperatures rose or activity levels increased.

Durability and Longevity Assessment

After extensive use, Element outdoor clothing has proven remarkably durable. The YKK zippers show minimal wear despite frequent use in sandy and muddy conditions. Fabric integrity remains excellent, with no signs of delamination or coating failure that plague some budget alternatives. The DWR coating has maintained effectiveness through multiple wash cycles, though I've applied aftermarket DWR treatment once per season as preventative maintenance. Scent control performance has exceeded expectations throughout extended use. The Polygiene treatment continues providing odor control even after numerous washes and extensive use. During multi-day hunting trips where washing wasn't possible, the garments maintained freshness better than untreated alternatives, contributing to hunting success in pressure-sensitive situations. The attention to detail in construction has impressed throughout testing. Reinforced stress points, quality thread, and thoughtful design elements demonstrate Element outdoor clothing's commitment to producing gear that lasts. While not quite matching the premium construction of brands costing twice as much, Element's quality-to-price ratio remains exceptional for hunters prioritizing value and performance over brand prestige.

Comparing Element to Premium Brands

The outdoor clothing market is dominated by premium brands charging $200-400+ for individual garments, making complete layering systems cost-prohibitive for many hunters. Element outdoor clothing disrupts this pricing structure by delivering comparable performance at 40-60% less cost, making quality hunting apparel accessible to working-class outdoors enthusiasts. Comparing Element outdoor clothing to industry leaders like Sitka, Kuiu, and First Lite reveals interesting performance parallels. In waterproof testing, Element's Infinity Series performs comparably to premium alternatives, with fully seam-sealed construction and quality materials. While the fabric hand and finish might not match premium brands' refined feel, the functional performance gap is minimal. Scent control comparison shows Element outdoor clothing's Polygiene treatment performing similarly to premium antimicrobial technologies. Independent testing by hunting publications has confirmed Element's odor control effectiveness matches more expensive alternatives, providing hunters with confidence in critical scent-sensitive situations. Where Element outdoor clothing shows differences is in advanced features and material refinement. Premium brands often incorporate proprietary fabric blends, advanced membrane technologies, and exclusive partnerships with textile manufacturers. These refinements provide marginal performance improvements that may matter to professional guides and extreme condition hunters but offer diminishing returns for typical recreational use. The weight comparison reveals Element outdoor clothing typically weighs 10-20% more than equivalent premium garments. This weight difference reflects Element's choice of more affordable materials and construction methods. However, for most hunting applications, this weight difference is negligible and far outweighed by the substantial cost savings. For hunters considering best outdoor clothing options, Element outdoor clothing provides the sweet spot between performance and value. Those seeking cheap outdoor clothing will find Element offers far better quality than true budget alternatives, while hunters wanting premium features without premium prices discover Element delivers exceptional value. Quality control comparison shows Element outdoor clothing maintaining consistent standards across production runs. While premium brands might have slightly tighter tolerances and more rigorous quality assurance, Element's manufacturing partners produce reliable, well-constructed garments that meet the brand's specifications consistently. The warranty and customer service comparison reveals Element outdoor clothing's commitment to customer satisfaction. Their warranty coverage matches industry standards, and their customer service team, staffed by actual hunters, provides knowledgeable support for sizing, product selection, and warranty claims. This personal touch often surpasses the corporate customer service experience of larger premium brands.

User Reviews and Community Feedback

Amazon Customer Reviews Analysis

Amazon reviews for Element outdoor clothing consistently highlight value and performance as primary strengths. A verified purchaser from Montana wrote: "After spending hundreds on name-brand hunting clothes that failed me, I tried Element as a budget alternative. The Prime Series jacket has performed better than my previous $300 jacket, keeping me warm and dry through a brutal late-season hunt. The price point makes it accessible for working hunters like myself." Common praise points include the quality of YKK zippers, effective water resistance, and comfort during extended wear. Multiple reviewers note that Element outdoor clothing performs similarly to premium brands they've owned, with several mentioning switching from Sitka or Kuiu due to Element's superior value proposition. Sizing concerns appear frequently in reviews, with most users recommending ordering one size smaller than normal outdoor clothing sizes. This feedback has prompted Element to refine their sizing charts and provide more detailed measurement guidelines. The company actively responds to sizing concerns and offers exchanges when customers experience fit issues.

Rokslide Forum Discussion Insights

The Rokslide hunting forum, known for its experienced and discerning members, features extensive Element outdoor clothing discussions. Forum member "Sobrbiker" provided detailed feedback after extensive field testing: "The lightweight Drive pants and Prime midweight jacket exceeded expectations. Well built, well stitched, great zippers, all treated water and stain resistant. The lightweight pants seem pretty tough-time in the field will tell." Forum discussions consistently praise Element outdoor clothing's quiet fabric performance, crucial for bow hunting applications. Multiple users report successful close encounters with game while wearing Element gear, validating the fabric's noise reduction capabilities. Value discussions dominate forum conversations, with many users expressing frustration with premium brand pricing and discovering Element as a viable alternative. Experienced hunters share positive experiences using Element outdoor clothing on challenging hunts, building community confidence in the brand's performance capabilities.

Reddit Community Experiences

Reddit's hunting and outdoor communities provide diverse perspectives on Element outdoor clothing. A popular thread discussing "lesser-known quality brands" featured multiple recommendations for Element, with users highlighting the brand's direct-to-consumer model and resulting value proposition. User experiences vary by application, with general consensus that Element outdoor clothing excels for recreational hunting and general outdoor use. Professional guides and extreme condition hunters sometimes prefer premium alternatives, but acknowledge Element's suitability for 90% of hunting situations. Negative feedback primarily centers on availability and sizing inconsistencies. Some users report difficulty finding specific sizes during peak seasons, and occasional quality control variations between production batches. However, Element's customer service receives consistent praise for addressing these issues promptly and professionally.

Balanced Performance Assessment

Strengths:

  • Exceptional value-to-performance ratio
  • Effective water resistance and scent control
  • Quiet fabric suitable for bow hunting
  • Quality construction with YKK zippers
  • Responsive customer service

Areas for Improvement:

  • Sizing runs large, requiring size adjustments
  • Limited availability during peak seasons
  • Slightly heavier than premium alternatives
  • Fewer advanced features than top-tier brands
Overall user sentiment toward Element outdoor clothing remains highly positive, with most hunters reporting satisfaction that exceeds expectations based on price point. The brand has built a loyal following among hunters who prioritize performance and value over brand prestige, creating strong word-of-mouth marketing that continues driving growth in the competitive hunting apparel market.

Buying Guide and Best Products

Essential Element Outdoor Clothing Pieces

Building an effective Element outdoor clothing system starts with selecting core pieces that provide maximum versatility across hunting seasons and conditions. Based on extensive testing and user feedback, certain items stand out as essential purchases that deliver exceptional performance and value. The Prime Series jacket represents the best single investment in Element outdoor clothing. Its mid-weight construction and weather-resistant properties make it suitable for 70% of hunting conditions, while the quality construction ensures years of reliable service. The jacket's pocket configuration and mobility features make it equally suitable for active hunting and stationary periods.

üèÜ Top Recommended Element Products

üß• Prime Series Hunting Jacket - Amazon üëñ Drive Series Lightweight Pants - Amazon
For hunters prioritizing mens outdoor clothing options, Element's Drive Series lightweight pants provide exceptional mobility and comfort. These pants work excellently as standalone pieces in mild conditions or as outer layers in cold weather systems. The water-resistant treatment and scent control technology make them suitable for extended use in challenging conditions.

Seasonal Recommendations

Early season hunting requires different characteristics than late-season applications. Element outdoor clothing's product line accommodates these varying needs through thoughtful design and construction choices that optimize performance for specific conditions and hunting styles. For September through October hunting, focus on the Drive Series for its lightweight, breathable characteristics. The quarter-zip shirts provide excellent temperature regulation during variable conditions, while the lightweight pants offer mobility without bulk. This combination works perfectly for active hunting styles and moderate weather conditions.

üå°Ô∏è Cold Weather Essentials

‚ùÑÔ∏è Infinity Series Waterproof Bibs - Amazon üß• Heavy-Duty Winter Jacket - Amazon
Late season hunting demands maximum weather protection, making the Infinity Series essential. The waterproof bibs and heavy-duty jackets provide comprehensive coverage against harsh conditions, while reinforced construction areas withstand the rigors of difficult hunting situations. These pieces represent Element outdoor clothing's most robust offerings.

Women's Sizing and Fit Considerations

Element outdoor clothing has expanded their women's line to address the growing female hunter demographic. Women considering outdoor clothing women options will find Element offers thoughtful design modifications that accommodate female body proportions while maintaining technical performance. The women's Drive Series pants feature adjusted rise and hip measurements that provide better fit and comfort for female hunters. Sizing recommendations for women's Element outdoor clothing suggest ordering true to size or one size smaller, as the cut tends to be generous through the waist and hips.

Budget-Conscious Shopping Strategies

Maximizing value with Element outdoor clothing requires strategic purchasing decisions that prioritize essential pieces while building a comprehensive system over time. Smart shoppers can assemble complete hunting outfits for significantly less than single premium pieces from established brands. Start with core pieces like the Prime Series jacket and Drive Series pants, which provide the foundation for most hunting situations. Add specialized pieces like the Infinity Series bibs or Flexlite insect protection garments as specific needs arise or budgets allow. This approach spreads costs while ensuring immediate functionality.

üí∞ Budget-Friendly Alternatives

üè∑Ô∏è Value Hunting Pants - Amazon
Monitor Element outdoor clothing sales and clearance events, which typically occur during off-seasons and new product launches. The brand's direct-to-consumer model allows for attractive pricing during promotional periods, making premium features accessible at even lower costs. Consider Element outdoor clothing as investment pieces that, while initially more expensive than basic alternatives, provide long-term value through durability and performance. Quality construction and effective features reduce the need for frequent replacements, ultimately providing superior value over cheap alternatives that fail quickly. For hunters seeking outdoor clothing sale opportunities, Element frequently offers direct discounts and participates in retailer promotions. Signing up for their newsletter and following their social media accounts provides access to exclusive deals and early sale notifications.

Conclusion

Element outdoor clothing has successfully challenged the traditional hunting apparel market by proving that premium performance doesn't require premium prices. Through extensive field testing and analysis, it's clear that Element delivers exceptional value for hunters who prioritize function over brand prestige. The combination of advanced technologies like Polygiene scent control, quality construction with YKK zippers, and thoughtful design features creates hunting apparel that performs comparably to brands costing significantly more. The brand's commitment to accessibility has democratized quality hunting gear, making technical apparel available to working-class hunters who previously had to choose between performance and affordability. Element outdoor clothing's direct-to-consumer model eliminates unnecessary markups while maintaining quality standards that satisfy demanding users across various hunting applications and environmental conditions. My personal experience with Element outdoor clothing across multiple seasons and challenging conditions confirms that this brand represents a paradigm shift in the outdoor industry. The performance gaps between Element and premium alternatives are minimal for most hunting applications, while the cost savings are substantial. This value proposition makes Element outdoor clothing an excellent choice for hunters building their first quality kit or experienced hunters seeking reliable backup gear. For outdoor enthusiasts exploring hiking clothing or winter outdoor clothing options, Element's versatility extends beyond hunting into general outdoor recreation. The same technologies and construction quality that benefit hunters provide excellent performance for hiking, camping, and other outdoor activities. Looking forward, Element outdoor clothing continues innovating with new technologies like Insect Shield integration and improved fabric blends. The brand's growth trajectory suggests continued expansion of product lines and technical capabilities, making now an excellent time to invest in Element gear before prices potentially increase with growing market recognition. Whether you're a seasoned hunter frustrated with premium brand pricing or a newcomer seeking quality gear that won't break the bank, Element outdoor clothing deserves serious consideration. The combination of proven performance, thoughtful design, and accessible pricing creates compelling value that's difficult to match in today's outdoor apparel market. For hunters who understand that success comes from skill and preparation rather than expensive gear, Element outdoor clothing provides the tools needed to excel in the field without financial strain.

Frequently Asked Questions

Is Element Outdoor Clothing worth the money?

Yes, Element Outdoor Clothing offers exceptional value for money. While priced significantly lower than premium brands like Sitka or Kuiu, it delivers comparable performance in key areas like water resistance, scent control, and durability. The brand focuses on providing working hunters with quality gear at accessible prices, making it an excellent choice for budget-conscious outdoors enthusiasts who don't want to compromise on essential features. My extensive field testing confirms that Element performs admirably across various hunting conditions while costing 40-60% less than premium alternatives.

What sizes does Element Outdoor Clothing offer?

Element Outdoor Clothing offers a comprehensive size range from Small to 3XL in most product lines. However, users frequently report that sizing runs slightly large, particularly in the chest and waist areas. I recommend ordering one size smaller than your typical outdoor clothing size. The brand provides detailed sizing charts on their website, and their customer service team is helpful for sizing questions before purchase. Women's sizes are also available with adjusted proportions for better fit and comfort.

How does Element compare to premium hunting brands?

Element outdoor clothing performs remarkably close to premium brands in essential functions like water resistance, scent control, and durability, while costing substantially less. Premium brands may offer marginal improvements in material refinement and advanced features, but these differences rarely impact hunting success for recreational hunters. Element's quality construction, featuring YKK zippers and thoughtful design, provides 90% of premium brand performance at 40-60% of the cost, making it exceptional value for most hunting applications.

Where can I buy Element Outdoor Clothing?

Element Outdoor Clothing is available through their official website, Amazon, select archery shops, and outdoor retailers like Black Ovis and Rogers Sporting Goods. The brand's direct-to-consumer model often provides the best pricing and product availability. Amazon offers convenient shipping and returns, while local archery shops provide hands-on fitting opportunities. Check multiple sources for the best deals, as pricing and availability can vary between retailers. For those seeking outdoor clothing near me options, many local sporting goods stores now carry Element products.

Does Element Outdoor Clothing offer a warranty?

Yes, Element Outdoor Clothing stands behind their products with warranty coverage that matches industry standards. They offer repair or replacement for manufacturing defects and premature wear under normal use conditions. The company's customer service team, staffed by actual hunters, provides knowledgeable support for warranty claims and product questions. Their commitment to customer satisfaction extends beyond the initial purchase, with many users reporting positive warranty experiences. This backing demonstrates Element's confidence in their construction quality and materials.

What makes Element's scent control technology effective?

Element outdoor clothing uses Polygiene technology, which incorporates silver ions into fabric fibers to neutralize odor-causing bacteria. This treatment is applied during manufacturing and remains effective through numerous wash cycles. Unlike topical scent control products that wash out or wear off, Polygiene provides permanent odor control that doesn't diminish with use. Independent testing and user experiences confirm that Element's scent control performs comparably to more expensive alternatives, making it highly effective for scent-sensitive hunting situations where wind direction and thermals matter most.

For more outdoor gear reviews and recommendations, explore our complete collection of outdoor gear clothing and outdoor sports clothing guides. Stay updated with the latest outdoor clothing clearance deals and seasonal recommendations.
